subject: Re: Order #SSN5760 confirmed
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Erik Palmer,     We sincerely apologize for providing you with incorrect shipping tracking information. We have now updated the correct tracking details in our system. Below is the accurate shipping tracking link for your package:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224936698
